item.title: Organ donor drive at Imperial
item.author: Rebekah C Judge,
item.description: Organ donation can be a taboo topic, as thinking about it requires us to confront our own mortality; something most of us would prefer not to do. This taboo needs to be tackled, as the mismatch between the number of people needing a transplant, and those willing to donate their organs, is vast. More â€¦
